title: Are there more shades of red or blue?
summary: By quantifying color in a way that accounts for how we perceive color, we can finally get to the bottom of this age-old question.
long_summary: So there are different shades of red and different shades of blue. But which color has more shades? What even is a "shade" to begin with? By quantifying color in a way that accounts for how we perceive color, we can finally get to the bottom of this age-old question.
